title: (x) Track curvy sans/Baby One More typewriter font - Plume, Courier {Costas Aggeletakis, Marc O}
content:
Hi,  
I would like to find the name, for this two families.

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122519im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typemachine_4582.jpg)

 [‹ (x) The Amazing Race logo squarish sans caps - Eurostile Extd {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122519/http:/typophile.com/node/40266 "Go to previous forum topic") [Petticoat logo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122519/http:/typophile.com/node/40263 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sweep

comments.content:
The first is Plume Bold, from Dalton Maag:

[http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/plume](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228122519/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/plume "http://www.daltonmaag.com/browse/fonts/dama/plume")
thanks a lot for your help !!!
